ar.com.zir.mail.server

Class Props

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.zir.mail.server.Props

  • public class Props
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Class that reads the mail server properties

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Method that returns the property value for this key or null if it does not exist

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getProperties(java.lang.String key)
        Method that returns all the properties whose keys start with the key suplied and end with ".1", ".2", and so on. Numbers should be sequential, the first hole found will make this method to stop reading properties for this key
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        a Map of properties, where the key will be the number (1 if property ended with ".1") and the value of the property
